about_the_game:
Treat your RPG's vampires to their very own hideout with the Legendary Palace ~ Vampire tileset for RPG Maker! Includes both male and female versions of statues!


The Legendary Palace ~ Vampire Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Water and waterfalls
Plain floor in gray, charcoal gray and red
Cobble textured floor in gray, charcoal gray and red (and versions with a curved border)
Fancy floor tile in gray, charcoal gray and red
Bat-themed floor tile in gray, charcoal gray and red
Various spike traps, holes and debris tiles


Walls:

Wall tiles to match floor tiles.


Also featuring:

stairs to match flooring
small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
bat-themed jewels and accents
treasure chest (with animated version)
decorative push block
bridge rails
multiple statues - large and small - male and female versions included
magic rings
diagonal stairs
3 designs of ladders
blood splatters
plus more!


Events and Animations:

Treasure chest
Animated flames
